paragraphs.body: This category contains all articles in the Avatar Wiki, but avoids redirects and other "non-content" links that can be returned by the "all pages" listing. You can also go to the ${link_0} project to look at the overview of the categorization system.
paragraphs.text: This category contains all articles in the Avatar Wiki, but avoids redirects and other "non-content" links that can be returned by the "all pages" listing. You can also go to the category project to look at the overview of the categorization system.
